articles.description: The Pakistan captain's go to shot is one worth studying, as is evident in a class IX science textbook, prescribed by the Federal Board of Education, Pakistan.
articles.content: A cover drive so good that its now being studied by school kids to understand physics. Babar Azams wondrous cover drive, a fan-and-critics favourite, is now in science text books for ninth standard k… [+2513 chars]
